file_content.text: Hey! You made it alright.
Yeah--ran into one of Zenjo's guys. Left him a scar, but he's still breathing, so a ride sounds good right now.
Give me twenty minutes, I'll set you up.
Keep her company. I'll be back soon.
I really do appreciate the help, but... can I ask you something?
Ask anything you want.
Go ahead.
Okay. This'll sound odd, but--what did Kaliyo say about us?
This rescue isn't what it looks like. Kaliyo plans to sell you to a bounty hunter.
You need to know something.
Right, of course she does. She's a freak.
You were expecting something like this?
You don't sound surprised.
She said you were partners for years.
Isn't she your friend?
She blames you for what happened to her on Hutta.
She says you humiliated her.
She's a habitual liar. She tell you the sob story about leaving Rattatak, meeting me, all that?
None of it's true. We hooked up a year ago, and she'd been on her own forever.
I've got to go. Don't believe anything she says.
You're Kaliyo's friend. Not mine.
I'd rather you stayed quiet.
That's the thing--I'm not, really.
She tell you we've known each other for years? Met after she left her homeworld? Big, long sob story?
You're telling me it's not true?
Something like that.
She told me. Even then, it didn't ring true.
I knew that story seemed odd!
What she told me is between us.
None of your business.
I'll take that as a "yes." Don't feel bad.
She's a habitual liar. I knew her for six months, and she'd been on her own forever--I don't even know where she's really from.
So I have to wonder: Is she really here to help? Or am I in even worse trouble?
I suggest you get offworld. And don't let Kaliyo find you.
Don't ask. Just leave.
Guess that's my answer. I owe you one.
Kaliyo plans to sell you to a bounty hunter. I assume she's fetching him now.
I'll tell you the whole truth.
Then I better get going. I owe you one.
So... where is she? I've got a bounty hunter waiting.
I wasn't going to let you sell her.
I sent her away.
You let her go? That's not your call!
She must've wandered off. I'm sure she'll be back.
Don't look at me...
She must've caught on. She slipped out while I was on the ship.
She escaped.
Don't you dare. You let her go. You let her go!
Now she's out there, and she thinks she's better than me! What were you thinking?
You bring me out here on a rescue mission. Then you tell me we're selling a woman to bounty hunters.
I could ask you that, too.
Fine, agent. Next time, I won't ask.
What she did is in the past. You're better than this, Kaliyo.
She's no threat to you.
I don't need to hear this from you.
Need I remind you that I run this operation? You don't question my decisions.
Stand down, Kaliyo!
I sure as hell do. You're gonna regret this.
Kaliyo owed you her life. She's here to repay. That's all.
Trust me, we're here to help.
Right. Guess we just wait, then.
Look who's back.
This the girl?
You set me up. You set me up!
Poor baby. I survived Hutta when you sent me there. If you can't take what this man puts you through, you get what you deserve.
Who is he? What'll he do?
What will happen to her?
He's just a freelancer--he'll take her to the Ylesian authorities, and she'll be sold into slavery.
You can still let her go. Is this really what you want?
You sure you want to do this?
Yeah.
Finish the exchange and let's get going.
Take her away.
I swear I'll kill you. I'll kill you!
You play along pretty good. Here's your cut of the profits--turns out she's worth a bundle.
According to her, you two only met in the last year.
Anspi'shel said some things...
Can we talk about this later? We've got spending money--that makes it time to celebrate.
If I ever go freelance, remind me to keep you around.
We make a good team.
Who says you could get rid of me? Come on--we should celebrate.
If you try something like this again, there will be consequences.
Don't ever lie to me. Got it?
Dangerous consequences? Lighten up--we've got money to spend.
Now is not the time.
